  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120471</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120471</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Balon, ki se  širi med  dvigovanjem v tekočini</string>
            <string language="en">Balloon expanding as it rises in a liquid.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Ballon, der als er erweitert, steigt in eine 
Flüssigkeit.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le ballon augmentant en tant que lui se lève 
dans un liquide.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O balão que expande como ele levanta-se em um 
líquido.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'aerostato che si espande come esso aumenta in 
un liquido.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπαλόνι που επεκτείνεται καθώς αυξάνεται σε ένα 
υγρό.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El globo que se amplía como él se levanta en un
líquido.</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Balon napoljnjen z idealnim plinom je na dnu bazena s tekočino in se začne dvigovati.</string>
            <string language="en">Balloon filled with ideal gas submerged at the bottom of a poll filled with water start to lift up.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tlak tekočine</string>
            <string language="en">fluid pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">razširjanje plina</string>
            <string language="en">gas expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ballon füllte mit dem idealen Gas, das an der Unterseite 
einer Abstimmung versenkt wurde, die mit Wasseranfang gefüllt wurde, 
um anzuheben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ballon rempli de gaz idéal submergé au bas d'un balayage
rempli de début de l'eau pour se soulever vers le haut.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O balão encheu-se com o gás ideal submerso no fundo de 
uma votação enchida com o começo da água para levantar acima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'aerostato si è riempito di gas ideale sommerso alla 
parte inferiore di uno scrutinio riempito di inizio dell'acqua per 
alzare in su.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπαλόνι που γεμίζουν με το ιδανικό που καταδύεται 
αέριο στο κατώτατο σημείο μιας ψηφοφορίας που γεμίζουν με την
έναρξη ύδατος που ανυψώνει επάνω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Globo llenado del gas ideal sumergido en el fondo de una 
encuesta llenada de comienzo del agua para levantar para arriba.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">flüssiger Druck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gasexpansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pression du liquide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expansion de gaz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pressão fluida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expansão de gás</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pressione del fluido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espansione dei gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρευστή πίεση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αέριο επέκταση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presión del líquido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">extensión de gas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
